snippet.title: Shien Mogui (しえんもぐい) || RPG Maker Horror Game (English Translated Playthrough) || Full
snippet.description:
Machine translated playthrough of Shien Mogui, a game by Kona 5 (well known for games such as Akemi Tan, Pilgrim and Sukutte) made in Wolf RPG Editor about two women who I'm fairly sure are journalists traveling to a small village to investigate an urban legend. The game is incomplete and, as far as I can tell, cancelled, but from what I gather it was meant to be episodic with each episode being a self-contained mystery, so technically it could be a full game as it currently is. I quite liked it myself, and I hope you do too! (And sorry again about some of the buggy parts the translation tool caused, not much I could do about them unfortunately.)

Download the game (untranslated): https://freegame-mugen.jp/adventure/game_7278.html
Translated using Translator++, which can be downloaded here: https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/translator-game-translation-tool.102706/
